name: AQUABATTERY
description:
AQUABATTERY is a flow-type long duration energy storage (LDES) solution. We have developed an innovative product that stores renewable electricity by using water and table salt. This revolutionary LDES is relying on abundant, environmentally friendly and cheap materials, table salt and water, which create the world's most sustainable, safe and scalable long duration battery.

Email: info@aquabattery.nl
Website: http://aquabattery.nl/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J-ATCYNa25E
Twitter: #AquaBattery
slogan: The world's most sustainable long duration energy storage solution based on saltwater.
